job.title: wordpress website upgrade, Cpanel configuration
job.description:
(Back ground to Understand the complexity & solution)

we have a word-press website with paid theme with some custom work previously done. The website was compromised hacked, we had the hosting agency resetting and refreshing the C Panel deleting all the folders with the latest back up restored prior to the hacked date. 

The website was successfully accessed and the malware script was removed. Now what we need is below 

(C Panel Task)
1. Check all the C-Panel folders files, data base for any virus scripts remaining, misconfigurations, check data base, word press files for any unauthorized access to any file or folders.

2. Check FTP accounts, any unwanted string attached or inserted by external party for accessing any information.

3. check all the necessary folders & files with any unwanted access, or changed settings to gain access.

(Word-press Admin )

1. check all outdated, unnecessary plugins, check word-press data base , 404, re directions and 301's 

2. Fire wall settings + cron events + cron schedules 

3. Checking and inspecting of sitemap+ .Ht-access file + robots.txt file for any misconfiguration. 

4. word-fence settings , wo-commerce inspection  and inspecting all necessary settings to ensure there is no 3rd party access and all the configurations are set to meet for a secured functional website.  

At-last we need someone from "Islamabad city" of Pakistan to do the work  ( Its a must)

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced freelancer to assist us with upgrading our WordPress website and configuring Cpanel. The project is expected to be completed in less than one month.

To be considered for this job, candidates must have a strong background in Python, SQL, .NET Framework, PHP, databases, cPanel, analytics, Google Analytics, Java, and of course, WordPress.

Your role will include upgrading our existing WordPress website with new features and functionalities, as well as configuring Cpanel to optimize website performance and security. We are looking for someone who can not only execute the technical aspects of the project but also provide insights and recommendations for improvement.

In your proposal, please explain how you can help us with this project, including any relevant experience and skills. Additionally, we would appreciate it if you could provide links to some of your past completed projects that showcase your expertise in WordPress website upgrades and Cpanel configuration.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and finding the right candidate to work with us on this project.
